channel.title: [Outdated] BUG: Stalemate system - No victory awarded when Reaper and Mastermind are last two people alive
channel.description: **What Happened** Issue: A mastermind and a reaper with only 1 soul were left as the only 2 players remaining in a game. Mastermind has nighttime death immunity. Reaper has conversion immunity. Neither side could claim victory. Game kept progressing multiple days and would have gone on infinitely. Eventually, both players left the game and the game ended in a draw. **What SHOULD have happened** Either the game would call for a stalemate draw after X days of no kills, OR, one of the two players would have been credited the victory in a stalemate scenario. Personally, I would have given victory to the NK (Reaper), since it's harder to win with Reaper and by being immune to conversion, he counters all of a Mastermind's capabilities. **Steps to Reproduce** Just have a Reaper **WITH ONLY ONE SOUL** and a Mastermind as the last two players in a game. **Comments** See the screenshots: this scenario began at around night 6. Game continued all the way to Day 11 until both players were so bored they just left.

item.dc:creator: Malchior
item.description:
What Happened

Issue: A mastermind and a reaper with only 1 soul were left as the only 2 players remaining in a game. Mastermind has nighttime death immunity. Reaper has conversion immunity. Neither side could claim victory. Game kept progressing multiple days and would have gone on infinitely. Eventually, both players left the game and the game ended in a draw.

What SHOULD have happened

Either the game would call for a stalemate draw after X days of no kills, OR, one of the two players would have been credited the victory in a stalemate scenario. Personally, I would have given victory to the NK (Reaper), since it’s harder to win with Reaper and by being immune to conversion, he counters all of a Mastermind’s capabilities.

Steps to Reproduce

Just have a Reaper WITH ONLY ONE SOUL and a Mastermind as the last two players in a game.

Comments

See the screenshots: this scenario began at around night 6. Game continued all the way to Day 11 until both players were so bored they just left.
